name: LD42 - No Disk Space
description:
This is a game that simulates the use of computers.
You find that your hard disk space is constantly decreasing.
Through various clues, you find the cause and finally solve this problem.
This game has 4 endings.

Contols

Just like you use personal computers

Development Tools

Unity 2018.2.0f2
Aseprite
